txt.en: A bounty notice in Ub Nishir has asked for someone to defeat the wasp Rakhûl in the Gorge of Woe to the north-east.
'I hear you have completed the posted bounty and slain Rakhûl.\n\n'You have my thanks. Here is something for the trouble and I will pass on the news of Rakhûl's defeat to the bounty poster.'
A bounty notice asks you to defeat a deadly wasp called Rakhûl in the Gorge of Woe.
Return to Neshurga and inform him of Rakhûl's defeat

The bounty notice reads:

'A dangerous wasp has been roaming the Gorge of Woe to the north-east and must be slain to protect travellers along the road.

'Speak with Neshurga in Ub Nishir should you defeat this beast.'
Return to Neshurga in Ub Nishir north of Maurûsh and inform him that you have completed the bounty and defeated Rakhûl.
